extendedInfo.description: This is a step by step instruction which will teach you how to draw animated cartoon characters.Have you ever dreamed of drawing beautifull cartoons yourself? Your child asks you to draw him his favourite animated movie character? Or maybe you're just a cartoon fan? Either way this application is for you.Drawing various Cartoon Characters from diffrent films and animated movies like Sponge Bob, Fairy Tinker Bell, Superman, SpiderMan, Dora and many more, has never been so easy.Try yourself, teach your kid or impress your friends with your drawing skills.Each drawing lesson is divided in 11 to 26 steps, and its extremely easy to follow.Have fun with this application at home, in school, while drawing on paper,or with chalk on pavement - do it everywhere!âââ 25 drawing lessons of cartoon characters âââUsing this application you will learn how to draw:â Mickey Mouseâ Minnie Mouseâ Goofyâ Donald Duckâ Little Mermaidâ Spidermanâ Supermanâ Batmanâ Spawnâ Wolverineâ Ironmanâ Doraâ Tweety Birdâ Family Guyâ Stewieâ Spongebobâ Pokemonâ Marioâ Tinkerbellâ King Kongâ Sonicâ Garfieldâ Master Yodaâ Kristoff From Frozenâ Scar from Lion Kingâ Snow Whiteâ Red Chibi Bird from Angry Birdsâ Luigi from Cars2â Tinker bell from fairiesâ Homer Simpsonâ Nemo from Finding NemoLearn how to draw in the easisest way possible. Using opur step by step instructions you can spend entertaining weekend with your children, make your trip to work in the morning more fun, become a creative person, or just check whether you can draw.Short review of Cartoon Characters which you will draw in our application:â Mickey Mouse is a funny animal cartoon character. Mickey is an anthropomorphic mouse who typically wears red shorts, large yellow shoes, and white gloves.â Goofy is a tall, anthropomorphic dog, and typically wears a turtle neck and vest, with pants, shoes, white gloves, and a tall hat originally designed as a rumpled fedora. Goofy is a close friend of Mickey Mouse and Donald Duck and is one of Disney's most popular characters.â Donald is an anthropomorphic white duck with a yellow orange bill, legs, and feet. He typically wears a sailor suit with a cap and a black or red bow tie. Donald is most famous for his semi intelligible speech and his mischievous and irritable personality. â Spider Man is a fictional character, a comic book superhero who appears in comic books published by Marvel Comics. â Superman is a fictional character, a comic book superhero who appears in comic books published by DC Comics. He is widely considered to be an American cultural icon. The character's appearance is distinctive and iconic: a blue, red and yellow costume, complete with cape, with a stylized "S" shield on his chest.â Batman is a fictional character, a comic book superhero created by artist Bob Kane and writer Bill Finger. Originally referred to as "The BatMan" and still referred to at times as "The Batman", he is additionally known as "The Caped Crusader", "The Dark Knight", and "The World's Greatest Detective," among other titles.â Wolverine It is a stocky and muscular carnivore, more closely resembling a small bear than other mustelids. â Iron Man is a fictional character, a superhero who appears in comic books published by Marvel Comics. â Dora, the main character, is an eight year old girl who embarks on a trip in every episode in order to find something or help somebody.

reviews.title: Best Drawing App by Far =)
reviews.comment: Drawinghand has made numerous wonderful drawing helpers, but this one is the BEST... By far!  Other apps will never reach the standards of this, let alone exceed them.  \"How to Draw Cartoon Characters\" is going to be the only app I use soon.  Yes, that is how awesome it is!  I can\'t wait to show my improved drawing skills to all my friends!  Get it today; don\'t delay!  You can draw so many well-known characters!  =D
reviews.author: Gabrielle Pegg
